content: get ready to crochet your own confetti cardigan a stylish and cozy oversized sweater perfect for layering this beginner-friendly crochet pattern uses chunky yarn to create a warm and trendy drop-shoulder cardigan making it the ideal handmade addition to your wardrobe ✨ pattern features ✔️ skill level beginner ✔️ sizes included xs s m l xl xxl ✔️ yarn bulky/chunky weight coriandoli by hobbii or similar ✔️ hook size 7mm for the body 6mm for ribbing ✔️ instant download pdf file with detailed instructions and a full stitch guide ✔️ video support follow along with a tutorial on youtube why you ll love this pattern quick and easy to make great for beginners features a textured stitch pattern that adds depth and coziness includes customization tips for length and fit perfect for fall winter and spring layering
